comment.body:
原站站主到此留名 没想到这玩意能够帮助到你
不过可惜的是它没有办法跨域引用 因为iframe会被zeronet识别是打开新网页 而不是内嵌网页

17-12-08 CORS插件不知为何失效

Failed to load http://127.0.0.1:43110/15uFE1XsFVemQ2Kf48KHfnogRnQfSLGQgm/loader/files/list.json?_r=_0.1.5_0.7955476217068367: No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource. Origin 'null' is therefore not allowed access.

问题又回来了
